text: Arsenio Cruz Herrera (December 14, 1863 â€“ April 8, 1917) was a Filipino politician. He was the first Mayor of Manila from August 7, 1901 to September 18, 1905. He was also the leader of the Progresista Party from 1907 to 1914. Category:1863 births Category:1917 deaths Category:Mayors of Manila
title: Arsenio Cruz Herrera
